message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to start.  Consider the inflation working against me!
Alice, your starting point heavily favors you, especially with inflation on your side.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to account for the decreasing value over time.

Bob, let's be realistic. I'm aware of the inflation, but your offer was too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 49.5/50.5 split, slightly favoring you to find a compromise.  Time is running out for me!
